about_the_game:
For more game content, please follow the official website of Chaoliang Zhanji and visit the "Wuhun Guoguang" section to fully understand. We warmly welcome players to come
Game introduction:
1. This is a 3D ARPG third person action adventure game developed with Journey to the West as the main game background
2. Please do not have high expectations for this game. This is just my first independent game project and it has been updated based on the Unreal 5 engine for development
3. Many cases and demonstrations about Chinese kung fu have been added to Wukong, inheriting the excellent traditional Chinese culture
4. The development and production of this game are twofold: firstly, to deepen the development of technical skills; secondly, to spread some of China's excellent traditional cultural history through the game
5. This game belongs to the author's personal efforts, and the total deposit for listing the game is $100. We do not want any cheating or abuse of the game for reverse engineering input or output. Once discovered, legal responsibility will be pursued
Finally, thank you very much for supporting and playing my game.

Game introduction:
1. This is a 3D ARPG third person action adventure game developed with Journey to the West as the main game background

4. The development and production of this game are twofold: firstly, to deepen the development of technical skills; secondly, to spread some of China's excellent traditional cultural history through the game

name: 悟之魂:历练创作

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This is a 3D ARPG third person action adventure game developed with Journey to the West as the main background. You will experience China's long traditional cultural history and kung fu culture through this game
